module.name: LDockTree
module.short: This unit defines TLazDockTree, the default TDockTree used in the LCL.

descr.p: ldocktree.pas contains TLazDockTree, the default TDockTree used in the LCL.
This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).

element.name: TLazDockZone
element.short: TLazDockZone - a zone for docking in a Lazarus form.

element.name: TLazDockZone.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.
element.descr: Destroy is the overridden destructor for TLazDockZone, It calls FreeSubComponents to free resources allocated to Page, Pages, and Splitter. It calls the inherited destructor prior to exiting from the method.

element.name: TLazDockZone.FreeSubComponents
element.short: FreeSubComponents - frees and nils the local splitter and page/pages components, ready for destroying the control.

element.name: TLazDockZone.GetCaption
element.short: GetCaption - if there is a child control, returns the caption for that control; else returns the Index of the control as a string value.

element.name: TLazDockZone.GetParentControl
element.short: GetParentControl - returns the identity of the Parent control if there is one; otherwise returns the Root zone if this is, in fact, the Root, or the Child control.

element.name: TLazDockZone.Splitter
element.short: The Splitter to be use to control the docking of this Zone.

element.name: TLazDockZone.Pages
element.short: The Pages (as in a Notebook) included in the dock zone.

element.name: TLazDockZone.Page
element.short: A Page in the Notebook included in the Dock Zone.

element.name: TDockHeaderMouseState
element.short: Record type used to track mouse position and button state in a dock header.

descr.p: Used in the implementation of TLazDockTree and TLazDockForm.

element.name: TDockHeaderImageKind
element.short: Enumerated type with values representing the images used in a dock header.

element.name: TDockHeaderImageKind.dhiRestore
element.short: Image for the restore button in a dock header.

element.name: TDockHeaderImageKind.dhiClose
element.short: Image for the close button in a dock header.

element.name: TDockHeaderImages
element.short: Array type used to store bitmap images used in a dock header.

descr.p: Elements in TDockHeaderImages can be accessed using the enumeration values in TDockHeaderImageKind. Used in the implementation of TLazDockTree and TLazDockForm.

element.name: TLazDockTree
element.short: TLazDockTree - a tree of TLazDockZones found in a docked window.

element.name: TLazDockTree.AnchorDockLayout
element.short: AnchorDockLayout - sets up anchors between all docked controls and helper controls.

element.name: TLazDockTree.CreateDockLayoutHelperControls
element.short: CreateDockLayoutHelperControls - creates any splitters and pages needed for the dock layout, including recursive creation for child controls.

element.name: TLazDockTree.ResetSizes
element.short: ResetSizes - splits available size of Zone between children.

element.name: TLazDockTree.BreakAnchors
element.short: BreakAnchors - detach the anchors of all child controls.

element.name: TLazDockTree.PaintDockFrame
element.short: PaintDockFrame - finds the cursor position and paints the dock frame of the specified size on the nominated canvas.

element.name: TLazDockTree.UndockControlForDocking
element.short: UndockControlForDocking - frees anchors from parent and sibling controls.

element.name: TLazDockTree.DefaultDockGrabberSize
element.short: DefaultDockGrabberSize - returns the default size for the dock grabber.

element.name: TLazDockTree.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TLazDockTree: creates a docking form if required, sets up a dock manager then calls inherited Create.

element.name: TLazDockTree.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TLazDockTree: frees the dock site, annuls the Docksite manager, destroys any images then calls inherited Destroy.

element.name: TLazDockTree.AdjustDockRect
element.short: AdjustDockRect - offset one of the borders of control rect in order to get space for frame.

element.name: TLazDockTree.InsertControl
element.short: InsertControl - undocks AControl and docks it into the tree.

descr.p: InsertControl - undocks AControl and docks it into the tree.
It creates a new TDockZone for AControl and inserts it as a new leaf. It automatically changes the tree, so that the parent of the new TDockZone will have the Orientation for InsertAt.
A newly created TLazDockTree has only a DockSite (TLazDockForm) and a single TDockZone - the RootZone, which has as ChildControl the DockSite.

element.name: TLazDockTree.RemoveControl
element.short: RemoveControl - destroy child zone and all parents if they does not contain anything else, then removes the dock control.

element.name: TLazDockTree.BuildDockLayout
element.short: BuildDockLayout - breaks the current anchors, forms the appropriate helper controls then re-establishes the anchors.

element.name: TLazDockTree.FindBorderControls
element.short: FindBorderControls - makes splitters for all bordering controls along the specified Side.

element.name: TLazDockTree.FindBorderControl
element.short: Gets the control with the specified dock zone and anchor side.

descr.p: Returns the DockSite if no controls are found using the specified zone and anchor side.

element.name: TLazDockTree.GetAnchorControl
element.short: GetAnchorControl - find a control to anchor the Zone's Side.

element.name: TLazDockTree.PaintSite
element.short: PaintSite - paint bounds for each control and close button (using the supplied handle).

element.name: TLazDockTree.MessageHandler
element.short: MessageHandler - checks the state of the mouse and takes the appropriate action. Checks whether redraw is needed because of mouse move or change in mouse button status, text needs to be added, etc.

element.name: TLazDockTree.DumpLayout
element.short: DumpLayout - writes layout of Zone to a file, for debugging purposes etc.

element.name: TLazDockTree.AutoFreeDockSite
element.short: AutoFreeDockSite - determines whether the dock site is free.

element.name: TLazDockHeaderPart
element.short: Enumerated type representing the parts in a dock header.

element.name: TLazDockHeaderPart.ldhpAll
element.short: Total header rectangle.

element.name: TLazDockHeaderPart.ldhpCaption
element.short: Header caption.

element.name: TLazDockHeaderPart.ldhpRestoreButton
element.short: Header restore button.

element.name: TLazDockHeaderPart.ldhpCloseButton
element.short: Header close button.

element.name: TLazDockForm
element.short: TLazDockForm - the default DockSite for a TLazDockTree and for TCustomAnchoredDockManager.

descr.p: TLazDockForm - the default DockSite for a TLazDockTree and for TCustomAnchoredDockManager
Note: There are two docking managers: TLazDockTree uses TLazDockZone to allow docking in rows and columns. TCustomAnchoredDockManager does not use TLazDockZone and allows arbitrary layouts.

element.name: TLazDockForm.Notification
element.short: Notification - if the required operation is removal, sets MainControl to nil, then calls inherited Notification.

element.name: TLazDockForm.UpdateMainControl
element.short: UpdateMainControl - sets MainControl to a new value.

element.name: TLazDockForm.MouseUp
element.short: MouseUp - calls inherited MouseUp then finds position and appropriate header.

element.name: TLazDockForm.MouseDown
element.short: MouseDown - performs inherited MouseDown, then finds position and appropriate header.

element.name: TLazDockForm.MouseMove
element.short: MouseMove - performs inherited MouseMove, then finds position and appropriate header.

element.name: TLazDockForm.MouseLeave
element.short: MouseLeave - performs inherited MouseLeave, and sets the local store of position to indicate absence of the mouse.

element.name: TLazDockForm.PaintWindow
element.short: PaintWindow - calls inherited PaintWindow, then creates new canvas and handle at cursor position, inserts header caption, title and images.

element.name: TLazDockForm.TrackMouse
element.short: TrackMouse - finds position of the mouse, which part of the control it occupies (whether header or main part of control), and state of buttons.

element.name: TLazDockForm.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TLazDocForm: calls inherited Create, then fills in the header.

element.name: TLazDockForm.Create.AOwner
element.short: Owner of the object instance.

element.name: TLazDockForm.Destroy
element.short: Destroy - destructor for TLazDockForm: removes header then calls inherited Destroy.

element.name: TLazDockForm.CloseQuery
element.short: CloseQuery - calls inherited method, then asks all top level forms if form can close.

element.name: TLazDockForm.UpdateCaption
element.short: UpdateCaption - brings caption up-to-date if there have been changes.

element.name: TLazDockForm.UpdateMainControlInParents
element.short: UpdateMainControlInParents - make sure all parents recognize the presence of MainControl.

element.name: TLazDockForm.FindMainControlCandidate
element.short: FindMainControlCandidate - finds forms and controls in the docktree hierarchy that could act as the MainControl.

element.name: TLazDockForm.FindHeader
element.short: FindHeader - identifies the part of the dock form that is the header, and returns a TControl.

element.name: TLazDockForm.InsertControl
element.short: InsertControl - calls inherited method then updates the main control.

element.name: TLazDockForm.IsDockedControl
element.short: IsDockedControl - checks if control is a child, not a TLazDockSplitter and properly anchor docked; returns True if OK.

element.name: TLazDockForm.ControlHasTitle
element.short: ControlHasTitle - returns True if nominated control is visible, is a docked control and has a border spacing greater than zero.

element.name: TLazDockForm.GetTitleRect
element.short: GetTitleRect - returns the coordinates of the title rectangle for the nominated control.

element.name: TLazDockForm.GetTitleOrientation
element.short: GetTitleOrientation - returns the orientation (horizontal or vertical) of the title in the nominated control.

element.name: TLazDockForm.MainControl
element.short: The identity of the MainControl in the docked form (used for the default caption).

element.name: TLazDockPage
element.short: TLazDockPage - an entity similar to a TLazDockForm, but forming a page in a notebook of TLazDockPages.

element.name: TLazDockPage.InsertControl
element.short: InsertControl - calls inherited method, then ensures that all parents recognize the MainControl.

element.name: TLazDockPage.DockZone
element.short: The DockZone in which this page is located.

element.name: TLazDockPage.PageControl
element.short: The PageControl or notebook in which this page is located (its parent).

element.name: TLazDockPages
element.short: TLazDockPages a notebook in which each page is a TLazDockPage.

element.name: TLazDockPages.GetFloatingDockSiteClass
element.short: GetFloatingDockSiteClass - returns a default class of TLazDockForm, overriding the inherited value.

element.name: TLazDockPages.GetPageClass
element.short: Gets the TLazDockPage class type used as the page class for the tabbed control.

element.name: TLazDockPages.GetPageClass.Result
element.short: TLazDockPage class type used for the page class.

element.name: TLazDockPages.Change
element.short: Change - calls inherited method, then ensures that all parents recognize MainControl.

element.name: TLazDockPages.Page
element.short: Page - an individual TLazDockPage in the notebook, referred by its Index.

element.name: TLazDockSplitter
element.short: TLazDockSplitter - a splitter used with Lazarus docking components.

element.name: TLazDockSplitter.Create
element.short: Create - constructor for TLazDockSplitter: calls inherited Create and initializes minimum size.
